Saturday Spotlight: The Reflection Room

This beautiful room is a safe haven for students who need help and support dealing with their emotions. We offer support in problem solving and dealing with stress.

Students are pulled for small group work, or Circles, where they learn how to express their feelings as well as listen to the feelings of others. They receive guidance in setting small goals and getting ready for successful weeks.

As you can see from the pictures, the Reflection Room is a cozy, safe space filled with inspirational quotes, stress toys, and puzzles. But most importantly, the room is filled with staff trained in Restorative Justice practices who are ready and willing to love and support all students!
